alert.note: Alert for Oneida (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 17 at 8:42PM CST until November 18 at 9:00AM CST by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...LAKE-EFFECT SNOW SHOWERS WILL RESULT IN HAZARDOUS TRAVEL CONDITIONS IN THE SNOWBELT THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING... .Heavy lake-effect snow showers will impact the western and northern parts of Vilas County tonight, then diminish Friday morning. Accumulating snow will also impact northern Oneida County, though totals will be much lower. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 4 inches, with the greatest amounts in northern Oneida County. * WHERE...Oneida County. * WHEN...Until 9 AM CST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
